entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpocg7ow9u/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0011.6824] It is expected that CommonStockValue with a value of 6,607,000,000 reported in the network role http://l3t.com/role/UnauditedCondensedConsolidatedBalanceSheets should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest with the dimension us-gaap:StatementEquityComponentsAxis = us-gaap:CommonStockMember and a reported value of 1,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://l3t.com/role/UnauditedCondensedConsolidatedStatementsOfEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:CommonStockValue fact are:
Period : 2018-03-30 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals of CommonStockValue : -6 Decimals of StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest : -6 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1039101/000103910118000008/lll-20180330.xml 4499

This value appears in the network role http://l3t.com/role/UnauditedCondensedConsolidatedStatementsOfEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this us-gaap:CommonStockValue fact are:
